title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes the Packers win over the Cardinals without their top receivers was Aaron Rodgers' most impressive performance of his career. He puts the Packers organization on notice and lays out why they need to repair their relationship with Rodgers this off season and convince him to stay in Green Bay. Colin gives out his Blazing 5 picks for week 8 in the NFL. Plus, NFL writer Kevin Clark joins the show to tell Colin if the 49ers have a QB controversy on their hands. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
